entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
